content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient, being located in the heart of the city. So, let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay for a month's rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment seems to be in a great location, and I'm sure it will meet my needs. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also within my budget. I'm willing to pay up to 800 Euros per month for the right apartment. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euros is quite low for an apartment of this quality and location. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of this property. Are you open to considering a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that the location and quality of your apartment are exceptional. However, as a student, I must be mindful of my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate a price closer to my initial offer of 800 Euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I must ensure that my tenants appreciate the value of my property. 800 Euros is simply too low for this apartment, especially considering its prime location and recent construction. I'm willing to negotiate, but the price must reflect the quality of the dwelling. How does 1000 Euros sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 1000 Euros per month is more in line with what I was expecting for an apartment of this caliber. While it's still higher than my initial budget, I'm willing to consider it. Would it be possible to include any additional amenities or services to make the apartment more affordable for me?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I provide a clean and modern apartment, and I expect my tenants to appreciate the value. Additional amenities or services are not typically included in the rental price. However, I am willing to negotiate the price based on your needs. Would you be willing to pay 950 Euros per month? This is a fair price considering the location and the fact that the apartment is brand new.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 950 Euros per month is more acceptable, given the location and the quality of your apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would it be possible to include a few basic furnishings, such as a bed and a desk, to make the apartment more livable for me as a student?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I prefer to lease unfurnished apartments to allow tenants to customize their living space. However, I can provide you with a list of local furniture stores where you can find high-quality items at reasonable prices. This way, you can choose the furnishings that best suit your needs. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your suggestion to provide a list of furniture stores is appreciated. This will help me to find the necessary furnishings for the apartment. With that in mind, I'm prepared to pay 950 Euros per month for the apartment. Is this an acceptable price for you?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that you find the apartment suitable and are willing to pay 950 Euros per month. This is indeed a fair price considering the location and the quality of the building. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
